title: Please ban the drop hacks...
body:
That is all...

People have asked for me to elaborate . Picture d/c that only affects players on your team selectively.

replies.body:
There are no "drop hacks".

That would require server hacking, which is impossible. Client hacking is hard enough with direct access to the executable.

LoL does not use any peer to peer networking or reveal the addresses of other players, making it impossible to DoS, send bad packets, ect.
